name: Maraschino Cherry Thumbprint Cookies
author: LemonMeringuePie
summary: Yellow-colored maraschino cherry thumbprint cookies, with a soft center. Taste has a hint of pineapple upside-down cake.
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Coat baking sheets with baking spray
Stir flour, baking powder, and salt together in a bowl
Beat sugar and butter together in a large mixing bowl with an electric mixer until light and fluffy
Stir in milk and vanilla extract
Add flour mixture and mix well
Shape dough into level tablespoon-sized balls
Place on the prepared baking sheets
Make a shallow indention in the tops of the cookies with your thumb; top each cookie with a halved cherry
Bake in the preheated oven until lightly browned, about 10 minutes
